=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

Yes

=head3 Local first day of the week

7 (Cawe)

=head2 Strftime Patterns

=head3 %c (%a %-e %b %Y %T %Z) - date time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Lwesb %-e Feb 2008 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Hla %-e Dis 1995 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Mgq %-e Sept -10 04:44:23 UTC

=head3 %x (%d/%m/%Y) - date format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 05/02/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/09/-10

=head3 %X (%T) - time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

See L<DateTime::Locale>.
